{{cpp/memory/pointer_traits/title|to_address}}
{{cpp/memory/pointer_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|memory}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|notes={{mark|optional member of program-defined specialization}}|
static element_type* to_address( pointer p ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs a raw pointer that references the same object as its pointer-like ([[cpp/named_req/Allocator#Fancy_pointers|"fancy pointer"]]) argument.

This function, if defined, is the inverse of {{rlpt|pointer_to}}, and exists as the customization point to be called by {{ltt|cpp/memory/to_address|std::to_address}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|fancy pointer/pointer-like object}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A raw pointer of the type {{c|element_type*}} that references the same memory location as the argument {{c|p}}.
